about_the_game:
Soul notes - Xiaohua · Ctrl women's group (with 29999 spirit coins attached) DLC includes soul probe Xiaohua · Ctrl women's group clothing, with 29999 spirit coins attached to the skin.


A new storm has been formed, which is bound to sweep the whole world!

* open angle design at the bottom of skirt, irregular button arrangement, beautiful curve!

* unlock the skin, and understand the mind process of "flower master (floret)".




CTR. L (click through rate leader)

Debut album: I'm Gold & I'm gonna down

Brokerage company: GKD Entertainment Co., Ltd.



Team member: Xiaohua

Location: lead singer

Constellation: Virgo

Height: 168 cm

Annoying: runny eggs, fashion magazines with too many words, and creases in the corners of clothes

Nickname: Huazong, Huahua

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1,Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 / AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB或AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1,Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
